author: Al Jazeera
title: Queen Elizabeth to address public as Johnson remains in isolation
description: The rare address will be broadcast at 19:00 GMT on Sunday.
content:
Queen Elizabeth will make an extremely rare address to the nation on Sunday, as the United Kingdom grapples with the increasingly deadly coronavirus outbreak.
The government has put the UK into a virtual lockdown, closing pubs, restaurants and nearly all sho… [+5047 chars]
